Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Atlantic Ocean: 1 , Black Sea: 4 , Celtic Sea: 1 , Ionian Sea: 3 , Mediterranean Sea: 1 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 2 ;
total: 12 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 27 : 2 , FAO 37 : 10 ;
total: 12 .
Remarks: This species has been reported from various European localities from sand and detritus in the subtidal zone to the abyssal depths.
